featured.text: Chemicals from the poisons kill reefs or make them weak, so they have less 37 to diseases.
The pollutants run with rainwater into rivers and streams, which 36 the poisons into the ocean.
We had better not breastfeed our babies, since babies are most likely to be poisoned by dioxin.

definition.en_def: A substance that is capable of causing harm or death when introduced into a living organism.
definition.example: The scientist carefully handled the poison to avoid any accidents.
